success.CARD_TRANSFER_BODY_DESTINATION: You have received {amount} {currency} to your default card.

errors.CARD_NOT_FOUND: Card not found or does not belong to the user
errors.PAYCO_BALANCE_ERROR: Could not retrieve balance from PayCo
errors.PAYCO_BALANCE_TIMEOUT: Balance inquiry timeout: PayCo did not respond in time
errors.ORDER_NOT_FOUND: No paid purchase order found for this user
errors.SHIPPING_RECORD_EXISTS: A pending shipping record already exists for this user
errors.SHIPPING_NOT_FOUND: No pending shipment found for this order
errors.CARD_NOT_FOUND_AFTER_ACTIVATION: Newly created card not found after activation
errors.NO_PAYCO_ID: Card without a valid PayCo ID
errors.NO_AVAILABLE_CARDS: No unassigned cards available at this time
errors.MARK_AS_ASSIGNED_ERROR: Could not mark card as assigned
errors.NO_CARDS_FOUND_IN_RESPONSE: No cards found in generation response
errors.ERROR_CARD_PROCESS: Error in complete card creation process: {error}
errors.CARD_ALREADY_DEFAULT: Card with paycoCardId {paycoCardId} is already set as default.
errors.SELF_TRANSFER: You cannot use your own email; use the card ID for internal transfers.
errors.DESTINATION_CARD_NOT_FOUND: Destination card not found, inactive, or does not belong to your account.
errors.INVALID_DESTINATION_ID: Invalid destination identifier (must be email or card ID).
errors.DESTINATION_CARD_INACTIVE: Destination card is not active in PayCo
errors.MIN_TRANSFER_AMOUNT: The minimum transfer amount is 1 MXN
errors.MAX_TRANSFER_AMOUNT: The maximum transfer amount is 50,000 MXN
errors.ORIGIN_CARD_NOT_FOUND: Origin card not found or inactive
errors.ORIGIN_CARD_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: Insufficient balance on the origin card
errors.ERROR_CARGO: An error occurred while charging the origin card. Please try again.
errors.ERROR_ABONO: An error occurred while crediting the destination card. A refund was issued to your origin card.
errors.ERROR_REEMBOLSO: An error occurred while refunding the balance to the origin card. Please contact support.
